topic.title: Under the Skin 2013 1080p BluRay REMUX AVC DTS-HD MA 5.1-RARBG
topic.body:
A female drives a van through the roads and streets of Scotland seducing lonely men. Its message may prove elusive for some, but with absorbing imagery and a mesmerizing performance from Scarlett Johansson, Under the Skin is a haunting viewing experience.


http://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/under_the_skin_2013/

topic.title: The Fountain 2006 1080p BluRay MPEG-2 DTS-HD MA 5.1-FGT
topic.body:
Requiem for a Dream director Darren Aronofsky switches gears from drug-induced urban malaise to abstract science fiction with this time-tripping symbolic tale of a man's thousand-year quest to save the woman he loves. Moving between representational stories and images, this meditation on life and death focuses on the concept of the mythical Tree of Life that is said to bestow immortality to all who drink of its sap. Even more avant-garde than his breakthrough film Pi, The Fountain finds Aronofsky almost completely abandoning conventional story structure in favor of something more cinematically abstract.


http://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/the_fountain/

topic.title: Pi 1998 1080p BluRay AVC DTS-HD MA 2.0-FGT
topic.body:
Max is a genius mathematician who's built a supercomputer at home that provides something that can be understood as a key for understanding all existence.
Representatives both from a Hasidic cabalistic sect and high-powered Wall Street firm hear of that secret and attempt to seduce him.

Dramatically gripping and frighteningly smart, this Lynchian thriller does wonders with its unlikely subject and shoestring budget.

http://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/pi/
